item.title: VRT
item.description: score:12 Chances: Vertiv Holdings Co. (VRT) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. The AI frenzy continues to dominate market headlines, with companies speaking on the technology in a snowballing fashion, which could benefit VRT.
